hero.label: Universal Checkout Protocol
hero.title: Pipeline-native checkout with antifraud built in
hero.description: Ship a unified checkout that verifies every step with chain hashes, scores risk in real time, and plugs into any payment or fulfillment provider.

antifraud.label: Antifraud pipeline
antifraud.title: Turn checkout telemetry into antifraud decisions
antifraud.description: UCP treats antifraud as a first-class pipeline step. Every event is hashed, scored, and ready for audit or escalation before payment is authorized — whether you run enterprise risk teams, marketplace trust ops, SaaS billing, or founder-led commerce.

personas.title: Enterprise
personas.description: Centralize risk policy with chain-hash audit trails and compliance-grade event logs.

personas.title: Marketplace
personas.description: Detect seller or buyer abuse with velocity checks, device fingerprints, and escalation steps.

personas.title: SaaS
personas.description: Prevent account takeovers and payment fraud with real-time scoring per subscription event.

personas.title: Entrepreneurs
personas.description: Launch antifraud defenses fast with a headless API and prebuilt signals out of the box.

items.title: Chain-hash receipts
items.description: Every step feeds the next hash. Any mutation becomes cryptographically visible across the pipeline.

items.title: Device & behavior signals
items.description: Collect fingerprinting, timing anomalies, and velocity checks to detect bots, hijacks, or abuse.

items.title: Risk scoring in real time
items.description: Weighted signals roll into a single score with allow, review, or block decisions.

items.title: Headless antifraud API
items.description: Expose assessments as a clean API for merchants, dashboards, and third-party automation.

templates.label: Try it now
templates.title: Pre-built checkout templates
templates.description: Click any template to launch a fully-populated checkout. Every field is encoded in the URL -- stateless, shareable, and resumable.

features.label: How it works
features.title: Built for verifiable pipelines
features.description: Every step is structured, traceable, and ready for antifraud workflows across providers.

items.title: Pipeline-native steps
items.description: Fraud checks are a required step alongside validation, payments, and fulfillment.

items.title: Zod-validated payloads
items.description: Every input, output, and signal is type-safe and validated from request to registry.

items.title: Chain-hash audit trail
items.description: Each pipeline event is cryptographically chained for tamper-evident verification.

items.title: Signal collectors
items.description: Velocity, device anomalies, and timing checks aggregate into a single risk score.

items.title: Multi-PSP compatible
items.description: Run consistent antifraud rules across Stripe, Polar, Shopify, and custom handlers.

items.title: Headless by default
items.description: Expose antifraud assessments via API, dashboards, or automation without vendor lock-in.

integrations.label: Integrations
integrations.title: Connect your services
integrations.description: UCP delegates to specialized services. Plug in payment providers, storefronts, and content systems.

items.shopify: Sync products, manage inventory, and fulfill orders through the Shopify Storefront API.
items.polar: Accept payments and manage subscriptions with Polar. Delegate payment processing seamlessly.
items.cms: Create SEO-optimized product pages. Publish content that ranks and converts.
items.effect: Typed, composable server-side business logic with EffectTS. Governs validation, enrichment, and processing pipelines.

roadmap.label: Development Status
roadmap.title: Current Progress & Roadmap
roadmap.description: Track the evolution of UCP. We're building in public with full transparency.

foundation.title: Foundation Complete ✅
foundation.description: URL-driven state management with nuqs, Zod validation schemas, and composable UI components are production-ready.

observability.title: Pipeline Observability
observability.description: Event logging, checksum verification, and runtime tracing for trustless commerce.

dashboard.title: Visual Dashboard
dashboard.description: Real-time pipeline monitoring, event streams, and handler health visualization.

distribution.description: Publish @ucp/entities, @ucp/pipeline, and handler packages for easy adoption.

development.title: Built with transparency
development.description: Every feature, every decision, every line of code is tracked in GitHub issues. Follow along, contribute, or fork for your needs.
